page.title: 07Tourism around Porthpean
page.content: I have chosen to do this subject for two reasons.One because my mum does bed and breakfast and two because Cornwall is well known for holiday makers.What attracts holiday makers are the golden beaches,beautiful countryside and the light-hearted friendly people.In the particular area I have been told to write about there are many holiday camps,caravan sites and beaches.Most of the area is scattered with coastal paths,woods winding country lanes,farms and beaches.There are many tourists who visit Porthpean beach,just down the road from me,sometimes crowding it.If tourists visit this beach in the Winter or early Spring they would think it a horrible beach because of all the seaweed brought onto the beach in bad weather from the reef running across the beach about 100 yards out.
